body:
So I was playing Avicus today, and I got a kill and had no golden apples so I died instantly since I was low. What if we had kill perks? For example if you get a kill you get regen for 3 seconds or if i get a kill you get absorption hearts for 3 seconds or resistance for 3 seconds. This is what i came up with:

Regeneration for 3 Seconds After Kill: 50,000 Credits
Absorption for 3 Seconds After Kill: 40,000 Credits
Resistance for 3 Seconds After Kill: 40,000 Credits

This way credits will be more useful and would prevent getting cleaned up in some cases. Thanks for reading!
body_tagged:

title: Suggestion Kill Perks

replies.body:
you're supposed to get golden apples from kills already. If you don't, it's a map bug that you can submit to http://Avicus.net/issues or https://avicus.net/forums/discussions/5671b2f86

For the suggestion itself, it's not a bad idea but we need devs for this to happen

Actually, ad ös {tag=47b15675a0484e8f863a0cbf86ba22dc} said, thats not a good idea due to that if you are stacked, maybe full diamond, and get the perks ur even more stacked and its going to be really hard to kill that person.

Anyways +1
